## Organisation (75 minutes)

* Spatial modelling: why and which kinds; is spatial autocorrelation just poor data collection design and/or model mis-specification? (15)
* Spatial modelling: graph/weight-based neighbours; distance; spatially structured random effects (15)
* QA/discussion
* Spatial regression: simultaneous and conditional autoregressive approaches (15)
* Spatio-temporal regression: spatial panel (15)
* QA/discussion
